title: Organization Structure Schema
description: The organizational hierarchy and internal composition defining how the group functions and distributes power.

leadership_type.description: The fundamental system by which leadership is determined within this organization.

character_id.description: Reference to a character who holds a leadership position within this organization.

title.description: The official designation or position held by this leader within the organization's hierarchy.

authority_scope.description: The specific domains or responsibilities over which this leader has decision-making power.

leadership.description: The individuals who currently hold power within the organization, making strategic decisions and representing its interests.

level_name.description: The official title or designation for this stratum within the organization's structure.

description.description: Explanation of this level's function, responsibilities, and place within the overall organizational structure.

requirements.description: What qualifications, achievements, or conditions must be met for a member to attain this level within the hierarchy.

hierarchy_levels.description: The stratified levels of authority and responsibility within the organization, establishing how power flows from top to bottom.
